summary: IBV is a positive sense single-stranded RNA virus belonging to the genus Coronavirus, group 3 (gamma coronaviruses) it is a positive sense single-stranded RNA virus, belonging to the genus Coronavirus, group 3 (gamma coronaviruses) it can be nephropathogenic and cause infection of the reproductive system. only homologous protection has been achieved against CK/CH/LDL/97I. in the middle east, the common circulating IBV strains are mass serotype vaccine isolates, H120 serotype vaccine isolates, D274 [14], IBV variant 1 strains (793/B, IS/222/96, IS/251/96, and IS/64714/96) by the end of 2009, variant 2 and variant 2-like strains appeared in Jordan and in northern Iraq. RT-PCR amplification was performed with a thermal profile of 94°C for 45 sec, 60°C (first step) and 53°C (second step) for 1 min and 72°C for 2 min for 40 cycles. IBV primer Sequence 5′ to 3′ Position in S1 sequence Reference SX1 CACCTAGAGGTTTG T/C T A/T GCAT 677 to 698A SX2 TCCACCTCTATAAACACC C/T TT 1148 to 1168. amplification was performed using the GenePro thermal cycler (Bioer, China) the nucleotide sequence identities were prepared using CLUSTAL W in the MEGALIGN Programme of the Lasergene software. the samples were collected from suspected IBV outbreaks in Iraq, Jordan, and Saudi Arabia. the samples were stored at 70°C in RNAlater solution (Qiagen, Germany) the diagnostic N gene amplification was done in a final volume of 25 L GoTaq Green master mix (Promega, USA) the final concentration of the N gene primers was 0.5 mmol. amplification was performed with a thermal profile of 94°C for 45 sec, 60°C (first step) and 53°C for 1 min and 72°C for 2 min for 40 cycles. annealing temperature for both RT-PCR steps was 50°C. gene RT-PCR products were sequenced using an ABI Prism 310 genetic analyser at the Princess Haya Biotechnology Centre. aligned sequences were used for phylogenetic analysis. clinical findings Vaccine used chicken/age JOA4 Trachea, ovary Drop in egg production H120 Watery cysts in ovaries M41 Layer, 24 weeks Short and enlarged oviducts 4/91 JOA2 Trachea, kidney, ovary Drop in egg production H120, M41, 4/91 Layer, 22 weeks Saudi-1 Trachea Respiratory signs H120, 4/91 Broiler, 22 days Saudi-2 Trachea Respiratory signs H120, 4 the CK/CH/LDL/97I strain is known to be endemic in China and Taiwan. the CK/CH/LDL/97I strain is known to be endemic in china and Taiwan. the CK/CH/LDL/97I and CK/CH/SCYA/10I strains shared 99.1% and 99.4% nucleotide identity to the CK/CH/LDL/97I and CK/CH/SCYA/10I strains. the CK/CH/LDL/97I and CK/CH/SCYA/10I strains shared 99.1% and 100% nucleotide identity to the CK/CH/LDL/97I and CK phylogenetic tree was constructed based on the alignment of the partial S1 sequence. all five IBV isolates were grouped with CK/CH/LDL/97I, CK/CH/SCYA/10I, J2 and Q1 in one group. nucleotide identity of these five isolates to the IBV vaccine strains in the three countries (M41, H120, and 4/91) were in the range of 78–82.1%, to variant 1 IBV the CK/CH/LDL/97I-like strain was first isolated in china in 1995. it was isolated from the tracheas of infected chickens. the strain showed slight variability in the partial S1 sequence.
